miniGames.ships

Class ShipPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGames.ships.ShipPlayer

  • public class ShipPlayer
extends Object
    class Player represents a player, stores the data of player and provides methods that let player to make moves and interact with opponents.
    Author:
    Wociech Stok≈Çosa

      • IGetShooted

        public int IGetShooted(int x,
              int y)
        Method called when the oponent shoot to this player
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of shoot on the x-axis
        y - coordinate of shoot on the y-axis
        Returns:
        if ship is destroyed return 1, if there is a ship return 2, if there are no ships return 3, if player lost return 4;

      • isLoose

        public boolean isLoose()
        get state of game
        Returns:
        true if player lost, else in other case
